channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Automating Htb Bank
item.description: The ‘Art’ of automation Because I wanted to get OSCP at some point, I started preparing for it by working through TJNull’s OSCP list. Currently, as another form of gathering knowledge and skills, I am doing the HTB CPTS. It is a lot of fun. I could already program in Python and wanted to see if it is possible to create a ‘one click pwn’. Or an automated sequence of steps to get to both of the flags.
